ComicInfo.Summary: "THE TREASURE OF THE TEMPLE" Julien, a prisoner of the Inquisition, finds an unexpected ally, and at long last recovers the stolen medieval scroll. What secrets does it contain? REX MUNDI: THE TREASURE OF THE TEMPLE completes the second story arc of the REX MUNDI saga.
ComicInfo.Title: The Treasure of the Temple
